channel.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
channel.description:
This should shed some light on what they really think: http://www.glassdoor.com/Reviews/Employee-Review-Jagex-RVW2174354.htm
Thought you'd all find it interesting to read. There are many other reviews if you navigate back a page.

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:21, topic:472391”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=590151.msg4178960#msg4178960 date=1355290361]

so even if andrew wanted to he could not regain full control of RS ever again?

Why would he want control of that shitty company, rather make a new one amiright?

Shitty company that’s raking in millions.

[/quote]The barely break even as far as I know.[/quote]

They’re making money hand-over-fist. It’s too bad they don’t even own half of their company though. The upper-management sold out and doesn’t give a damn; as Mark Retard has proven numerous times.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Black Not:

is the reason you provide his own words or do you only assume?

I state the stuff that’s been on the internet since it happened. It should be obvious

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @Black_Not Black Not
item.description:
@Black_Not wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:16, topic:472391”][quote author=Black Not link=topic=590151.msg4178928#msg4178928 date=1355285977]
so even if andrew wanted to he could not regain full control of RS ever again?
[/quote]

Why would he want control of that shitty company, rather make a new one amiright?[/quote]
the idea is it wouldn’t be so shitty anymore if he had something to do about it i.e. how jagex handled there shit back in 07.

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:18, topic:472391”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=590151.msg4178960#msg4178960 date=1355290361]

so even if andrew wanted to he could not regain full control of RS ever again?

Why would he want control of that shitty company, rather make a new one amiright?

Shitty company that’s raking in millions.
[/quote]

Andrews game lost vision over the years. He left because he knew it lost purpose and decided to take his time into the next big thing rather than to fix something that can’t be fixed. If you want to talk money, there is a reason they sold out.[/quote]
is the reason you provide his own words or do you only assume?

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:17, topic:472391”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=590151.msg4178955#msg4178955 date=1355289775]

so even if andrew wanted to he could not regain full control of RS ever again?

Why would he want control of that shitty company, rather make a new one amiright?
[/quote]
Shitty company that’s raking in millions.[/quote]

Andrews game lost vision over the years. He left because he knew it lost purpose and decided to take his time into the next big thing rather than to fix something that can’t be fixed. If you want to talk money, there is a reason they sold out.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Spades:

“In December 2010, Andrew left the Jagex board of directors. During 2011, he was the principal architect of Jagex. Since November 2011, he isn’t listed in RuneScape Credits and he doesn’t have any holdings in Jagex anymore.” -Wikia

Architect referred specifically to the game engine. He may also have had some bearing over the server architecture too. That does not refer to design.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:

“In December 2010, Andrew left the Jagex board of directors. During 2011, he was the principal architect of Jagex. Since November 2011, he isn’t listed in RuneScape Credits and he doesn’t have any holdings in Jagex anymore.” -Wikia

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Black Not:

Indeed, I wonder how different the game would be with regards to graphics and features if Andrew was still the lead developer.

Andrew was lead dev for runetek 5, so not much different…Plus he has little bearing on design.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews

item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

RuneScape 2 died for me a long time ago due to bad updates.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Black Not, post:7, topic:472391”]Indeed, I wonder how different the game would be with regards to graphics and features if Andrew was still the lead developer.[/quote]The lead developer would’ve gotten told the same things by the ‘senior management’. The lead developer, I’m assuming, is/was just over RuneScape development and was likely getting told what to do by the senior management (those who oversee Jagex as a whole).

Basically, Jagex is full of ignorant pricks who don’t listen to a word their customers tell them. FunOrb died because they kept pushing shitty games that customers told them were horrible and RuneScape is dying (if not dead) because of the micro-transactions and other ridiculous updates pushed for money instead of good content.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

Jagex as a company are very unprofessional in general. I’m not surprised that ex employees and even current employees don’t like it there, considering how bad their customer support is and their lack of a good relationship with their players. When you start implementing things such as the SoF and Solomon’s General Store only to take advantage of people with gambling problems in return to get somewhat of a profit, then it becomes an issue and clearly shows something very wrong within the company.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous Jagex Employee Reviews
item.dc:creator: @Black_Not Black Not
item.description:
@Black_Not wrote:

Yes, a lot of the reviews talk about how how Jagex are now profit > what the players want (as if you didn’t already know that).

Read full topic
